definition.text: Volatility Bands take a Volatility Adjusted Moving Average (VAMA) to produce bands similar to Bollinger Bands and the Keltner channel.

paragraphs.text: The Long period (L), Short period (S), and Centre (C) parameters of the VAMA can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under ’Volatility Bands’ Product Definition.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| Volatility Bands | Volatility_Bands | vama, up, low |
